articles.author: Neuroscience News
articles.title: Women' Life Expectancy Six Years Longer Than Men - Neuroscience News
articles.description: A new study reveals an increasing life expectancy gap between men and women in the United States, now at its widest since 1996.
articles.content: Summary: A new study reveals an increasing life expectancy gap between men and women in the United States, now at its widest since 1996. The study attributes this growing disparity to factors includi… [+5399 chars]
